name: Ketalar
description:
Ketalar is a 2.5D dungeon explorer that I worked on with a small team of artist for a game jam. In it you play as a the Scarf Kid and have to try to avoid the large monster while also fighting and killing the smaller ones. We will be uploading more images and a video soon.

Programmer and Designer

  • Gage Copelin

 Character Design and Animation

  • Angelique Carrillo
  • Kyle Houseman
  • Kannon Rickell

Music and Sounds

  • Nicholas Stratigos/Ghost House Sound, Music
